11.content:
Alex- A girl about 5'9". She is skinny but has a doughy middle and likes to show it off with short shirts. However when it starts bulging out more than usual she doesnt notice and is oblivious to what others say. 121 lb.
Lizzie- A petite girl at only 5'0". This little girl is getting bigger by the second and soon she wont be so little. 75lb.
Suzie- A plump girl at 5'6". This girl told everyone she is pregnant not fat, so now she is constantly keeping herself stuffed to look the part. This story should have most of the weight going to her belly. 131lb.
Darla- A skinny girl at 5'9". This popular girl is dating the hottest boy in school. However little does she know he likes big girls and wants to fatten her up. This girl is very trusting, gullable, and stupid. Also her parents are rich and she can do anything she wants. Also this girl's best friend, Frieda, is a lazy girl who weighs 169lb. 102lb.
11.title: Normal

111.content:
Let's try something different for this one.
Alex is a teenage girl in the future.

Is this a near future, a far future, or a very far future?
111.title: Alex

choices: Alex starts her first day on the job
skip ahead two years, after awhile on the job
1111.content:
In the near future, McDonald's and other fat food restaurants have taken over. There's now at least two fast food restaurants on every street in the US.
The corporate higher-ups of fast food chains used their money to attain jobs in the government, and eventually as presidents.
There are now addicting fast food shops in schools, no more sports teams beside sumo wrestling, and the obesity rate is at 99%

Alex is a teen in this age who has managed to keep off her weight for eighteen years, but now she's off on her own and she doesn't have her parents to stop her temptations from taking over.

She has just taken up a cubicle job at a Burger King corporate building.
1111.title: Near future (2050)

choices: the rest of the day with MrsBulla
the rest of the day with mrsbulla
11111.content: It was Alex's first day of work, she was an 18 year old 120 pound woman trying to find her place in the world. Alex enters the building and is greeted by her boss, Mrs Bulla. Mrs. Bulla was an over 300 pound woman in her late 30s. She had long fair hair which she kept in a bun, her facial features were flawless which she enhanced with well skilled applied makeup such as red lipstick and eye shade. She had fancy manicures every day giving her gleaming finger nails. Mrs Bulla went to the spa daily constantly maintaining her smooth supple skin with lotioned massages. She adorned herself with extravagant jewelry wearing necklaces, rings, bracelets, and earrings that would make any woman envious. But what really impressed people was her gorgeous body, filled with jiggly fat. Her belly was massive, stretching her taut dress which would tear to shreds if it wasn't so well made. Her legs appeared as if drums of cottage cheese had been pumped into them. Her extremely gargantuan buttocks swayed and rippled with each step. Her beautiful face was filled with fat, with jowels jiggling as she spoke. Mrs Bulla's arms were utterly smothered in lard, fat hung from the limbs and jiggled with the slightest movement. Her boobs were monumental, colossal bags of fat that were every bra's worst nightmare, spilling out of any constricting clothing these soft cannon balls bounced with every breath. Mrs Bulla was wearing a low cut red dress and expensive red high heels eating a huge ice cream cone. "Ah you must be Alex- OH MY! you're so skinny!" Mrs Bulla exclaimed somewhat freaked out. Alex could only mutter and look down at her feet. "I know I'm weird." "hmm whats that?" Mrs Bulla said joyfully moving closer to Alex. "I know I'm skinny but I was never able to eat enough." Alex said. To all of Mrs Bulla's employees it was common knowledge that she was extremely generous and charitable. "Well that changes today hun, forget about work we need to get you fat ASAP!" Mrs Bulla said wrapping her thick squishy arm around Alex "You're gonna spend the day with me, eating and living lavishly, plus I'll get to know you, I always like to know my employees." Mrs Bulla said gesturing to a servant. "Craig two mega burgers!" she said. "Right away ma'am" said the diligent servant who quickly came with a platter carrying two massive burgers loaded with everything from several strips of bacon to beig drenched in sauces. Mrs Bulla immediately grabbed one of the behemoths and sunk her teeth into it moaning in ecstacy as the greasy food slide down her throat. Alex picked hers up finding it very heavy and takes a bite. Alex's eyes lite up as the high calorie substance traveled throughout her body activating her fat cells. Alex knew being around Mrs Bulla would make her beautiful.
11111.title: Alex starts her first day on the job

choices: Fast forward, after a few years in the corporate chain
1112.content:
Alex is a teenage girl growing up in the year 2300, in the average large mega-city.
The Earth has changed a lot since then. Levitating motorcycles with no wheels and hovering cars now pack the streets. All money transactions are taken care of by ID cards given out at eighteen. Skyscrapers touch the clouds and all screens are interactive holograms. Everyone sports glasses with Internet, TV, voice chat, and music.

In this future society, obesity is more common than thinness. Fashion advertisements flaunt girls with massive waistlines and huge, hanging bellies. Food restaurants litter cities and all seats have been adjusted to fit massive frames. Morbid obesity rates have just hit 80% two years ago, and the thin make up a small .5% of the population.

Alex has turned eighteen and has been given her ID card and an office job as a secretary.
Her parents never fed her much food and she's always adored the popular fat girls at her high school.
Now that she has this new job and her very own apartment in complex #342 Room #325, she can bulk up and get as fat as she wishes.
1112.title: Far future (2300)

11121.content:
Alex puts on her heeled boots, black skirt, white shirt, and fixes up her hair.
She slipped on her e-glasses and boarded her hover-scooter, and she drove down the city streets.

After a bit of a drive, Alex arrived at her company; glutcorp.
Glutcorp is a designer of furniture for large waistlines. Recliners with chip bag disposal and cup-holders, extra-wide car seats with ass heater/coolers, sofas with extra large massaging built in, you name it, glutcorp designs it.

She walks in and heads to an elevator. She presses floor #121.

A massive woman, at least 700 pounds, waddles into the elevator with the company newbie. She wore an expensive designer outfit. Cashmere leggings wrapped around legs that were massive rolls of fat. With fine, leather boots that went up massive calves.
Encircling a waist four or five feet in circumference was a dark skirt that showed the outline of her ass (one that Alex would kill for)
Bulging out from her top were two gigantic breasts.
Of course, her face was gorgeous. Lots of blush makeup was spread across chubby cheeks above her two chins.

This woman was viewing some business info on her e-glasses while scarfing down the rest of a breakfast sub sandwich.

But then Alex gazed upon her nametag.
"Bertha Glut: CEO"

Alex was amazed, she had been looking at her master for the past thirty seconds. This woman would run her life from now on, determining Alex's work and pay.

Bertha glanced over, jiggling her chins.
Her face lit up and she reached her hand out to shake Alex's, chiming dozens of precious bracelets made out of quality gold and diamonds. She looked to be sporting at least 3 million dollars worth of jewelry on her arms.

"Why hello there, you must be the new secretary. I'm glad to meet you."
They shook hands, Bertha's chubby fingers wrapping around Alex's thin ones.
"My, you're awfully thin. Your portfolio said you're eighteen. I hope you enjoy your first job, and put some meat on those bones!"
Bertha let out a snobby laugh and Alex got off at her floor, while Bertha continued to floor #200; an entire floor dedicated to managing glutcorp.

Alex saw her work station.
A sleek, half-circle desk with a full hologram computer display workstation going around the desk.
Her seat is a levi-char, a circular, cushioned, levitating chair that floats around at ease by leaning in any direction.
These seats are made for body types ranging from 100 pounds to 2000 pounds. Making immobility in this future not a problem.
11121.title: First day of work

111211.content:
Alex typed from her levi-chair on her hologram-interface.
It wasn't a glamorous or particularly fun job, it's very sedentary, but well-paying.

The words "Donut run!" filled the air.
The company bought the entire workforce their own boxes donuts every day.

A female worker hovered by Alex's desk with a box of donuts for her. She had clearly liked donuts herself; her size was massive. Her levi-chair was five-feet wide, all of which her ass took up. Big, meaty legs hung off the chair. And her face was smeared with chocolate.

Alex opened up her box and was overwhelmed by the scent of twenty-four donuts. All the width of the average DVD (of course, DVDs are ancient relics in this time)
Half of the box was deep-fried, sugared, jelly-filled donuts. The box itself seemed to weight a couple pounds.
The other was filled with chocolate-filed donuts. Alex had never been fed this food by her parents before, and was ready to stuff herself.

She polished off the entire box, those donuts were the best thing she'd had in months.

She looked down at her belly, it was noticeably larger. Her shirt was tighter and some grease was wiped on her shirt.

A message echoed through the room "Work day over, enjoy the rest of your day."
Alex's work day was over. She hovered her chair over to the elevator and she was lifted down to the first floor. She lifted herself out of the chair with some struggle (she had been sitting in it for the entire day) and purchased a regular soda from the machine. The size of a normal soda is 24 .oz, and the largest is 64. And that's just from a soda machine)
111211.title: Onto work!

choices: Alex continues to talk to Jack
Alex does not talk to Jack
1112111.content:
Alex was woken up from her bed by the sound of the alarm. Rolling over, she realized that when she went to bed she slept for 12 hours, and it was time to get to work. Rather than walk all that way, she summoned her hoverchair. That did not mean she did not want to stand, however. She very much wanted to stand to see how she looked. Doing so, she turned towards a mirror on the nearest wall and was repelled by her size. At a mere 65 centimeters, her waist did not equal her smallest friends. And therefore her sexiness did not either.I must become fatter if I am to have even the smallest chance of love, Alex thought, pinching what little fat she did have. And indeed it was true. She had to be assigned a boy at prom because she was so thin that nobody liked her. Her hoverchair reached her, and she fell into its soft cushions.And more fat I will gain, she vowed internally. Taking care not to move a muscle, she went down from her apartment, into the street, and into Glutcorp’s offices.

As Alex floated to her cubicle, she could not help but notice that everyone’s eyes were on her, and she distinctly heard the mutterings of her coworkers about how thin she was. Everyone wondered if she was unhealthy.I am trying! I will become sexy! Alex wanted to shout. But she knew if she did, she would most likely lose her job. And so it was in silence that she floated to her cubicle and opened up her editing program. Her first project of the day was a sub assembly on a car. The design team had a problem with a fastener that connected the integrated vending machine to the dash. As it turned out, the materials used in the fastener were of poor quality. It was Alex’s job to determine what materials were best. And she set upon the job with the intense focus of a new employee.
“Donut run!” Came the shout. “About time,” Alex muttered. After dealing with the fastener issue, she validated the design of a crash net, ran a simulation on a new hoverchair, and filed the reams of paperwork needed to begin clinical testing of a new feeding machine for reverse anorexia clinics. In short, she was mentally exhausted. A coworker approached with Alex’s box of donuts. Taking them, she looked at the selection today. It was a dozen donuts, but instead of deep fried jelly filled and chocolate, it was a new mix. Four were deep fried chocolate. Another four were glazed crawlers. Two were deep fried bacon donuts, and the last two were glazed. Alex could not help but mutter “Me gusta” before she began eating. And eat she did. She ate each DVD sized donut from the outside in, eating it like a bird so as to not waste a single calorie. Despite this, it did not take long for her to finish. Inside of ten minutes, she was done. Burping softly, she rubbed her belly. “Work day over. Enjoy the rest of your day,” came the shout over the intercom. Going out, Alex began the next activity of her day. Speed dating.

After many minutes of floating outside the well appointed building, she asked a guy floating in the front if this was girlsgonefat dating. “Why indeed it is,” he responded. Floating in, she went to the clerk in front and said “Alex done. Reporting for dating.” “Table 7,” the clerk said. Floating to table seven, she rested and waited.

It went as she expected, more or less. Guy after guy came to her and they were given five minutes to talk, and most conversations ended as expected. They said they liked her, but she needed to gain weight. Just as she was finished, another guy approached. She expected it to go as all her other conversations did. “Hello,” Alex muttered, not wanting to talk. “Hello indeed,” the guy muttered, looking her over. “What is your name and age?” the guy asked. “Alex. Age 18. And yours?” Alex asked. “Jack. Age 18.” The man responded. This Jack was a weird one, Alex knew. While he was big and fat like any other good man of this generation, there seemed to be a dexterity that others of his size lacked. The way in which his fingers moved intrigued Alex. “It is not like we can talk anyways. The speed dating time is over,” Alex muttered. Jack countered, most eloquently, “We’re adults here. We can do as we please. Shall we continue this conversation elsewhere”
1112111.title: the second day of work, and a date (maybe)

11121111.content:
“As you wish,” Alex said. “Good. There is a good all you can eat buffet not far from here. 451 Washington Ave. How does that sound?” Jack asked. “Sounds good to me,” Alex responded. “See you there,” Jack said, floating away.Must be bones night. There can be no other reason for this. Either that or this is an elaborate prank. She thought. She almost did not go, but in the end decided to I only lose minutes of my life, she reasoned.

Alex floated down to 451 Washington avenue. And much to her suprise, Jack was there, and waving at her. She floated towards him, unsure if he would dart away. Suprisingly, he didn't. “Let's eat,” he said, floating in. Alex followed him. And to her suprise, there was indeed an all you can eat buffet in the place. Jack floated up to the hostess and asked for a table for two. “More like one and one twelfth,” she replied snarkily. Regardless, they got a table. And Alex and Jack floated in.

“That was uncalled for,” Alex muttered. “I agree,” Jack responded. “It's not as though weight is a genetic thing. One simply needs to consume more calories than they burn. You have not had the opportunity to do that until now, or at least that's how it seems to me.” “You would be correct. I have had a rather restricted life,” Alex replied. “Indeed? Explain?” Jack responded. “Let me put it this way. My parents only let me eat 2,000 calories a day. And they made me do these things called push ups. They were terrible. I was sweating...” Alex paused when she saw Jack recoil in obvious horror. “Only 2,000 calories a day. Surely you mean a snack?” He practically shouted. “No. Per day,” she responded. “And what is a push up?” Jack asked. “Let me show you. Please don't hate me.” Alex begged. “I promise not to,” Jack said. And with that, she stood up. Then she lay on the floor. And then raised herself up on her hands. And let herself down, still on her hands. Then she laid back on her hoverchair. Somewhere a girl screamed in terror. “Never do that again. Never!” Jack shouted, clearly traumatized. “I thought you said you wouldn't hate me.” Alex responded. “I don't. But never do that again.” Jack said. “I do not intend to,” Alex muttered, looking down in shame. “Good. And now to eat. You better impress me. Especially after what you did,” Jack muttered, punching his order into a tablet, and Alex doing the same.

Jack noticed a serving robot used for only the heaviest orders. He knew it was not for him, as he only ordered a normal amount. But it came to his table. “Here's your order sir,” it said, handing out two forty pound burgers and the expected amount of fries. And then it turned to Alex. “Are you sure you can eat so much madam,” it asked.”Yes,” Alex responded. “Very well,” it said, pulling out three forty pound burgers, a bacon covered half sheet cake, and a two gallon milkshake. It then left. And the eating began. Jack watched Alex over his own food. In little more than an hour, Alex ate everything. And her belly was quite a nice shape.Impressive, Jack thought.

Alex came up from her feast slowly. She realized then that she had in fact out eaten Jack. Rubbing her spherical belly slowly and leaning back, she noticed Jack do the same. “impressed?” She asked. “Very. Here's my number,” Jack said, leaving. And Alex left for her own appartment, called Jack, and dreamed about her next day at work. Or another date;
11121111.title: Alex continues to talk to Jack

1112112.content:
The rest of the week was full of donut-runs and gorging at fast food restaurants. This had reflected in Alex's waistline.
99% of her days are spent sitting, so it's no surprise she bulked up.

Alex woke up in her apartment's bed.
She rolled out of bed and went to the bathroom to check her weight: 200

Her once thin frame had disappeared in a layer of fat. By this time's standards, she was still thin, but just less-thin

She put on her work clothes, bigger ones, mind you.
Alex then arrived at work.
1112112.title: Next week

111212.content:
Bertha comes around Alex's workspace via levi-chair. Alex was focused on her hologram screen, typing away on the virtual keyboard.
"Ah, Alexis, there you are! I'd like to invite you to my floor for the rest of the day. We have some matters to discuss."
Alex didn't even need to control her levi-chair, Bertha has full control of all the equipment in the company, including the chairs. It just floated behind Bertha's extra wide one. They hovered into an elevator and it started going to floor #200.
Bertha noticed Alex admiring her fine necklaces.
"Oh, I see you noticed my neck jewelry. I only purchase the finest from the top shops in the city."
Bertha smiled as she pulled one of the many from her neck.
"Here you go, Alexis. consider it a gift from me to you. I like to treat my employees like family around here. And you're just like a daughter to me."
Alex blushed as Bertha slipped a necklace over her, it was worth at least 3X her yearly salary.
"You see, dear, I expect the up most respect from my family, is that understood? You wouldn't disobey your mother, would you?"
"No ma'am! I respect you very much."
"Wonderful! Now let's take this to my floor."
The elevator stopped at room #200.

Bertha hovered out and Alex follow suite.
She was greeted to hundreds of expensive paintings, all of Bertha. They hovered over to her desk, which was the finest desk Alex had ever gazed upon.
"Now you see Alex, I like to keep the image of society around here. It's good to be big and fat! Almost everyone is nice and plump like moi!"
Bertha gave a generous pat to her belly and a loud belch came from her mouth.
"What you are doing with your body is strange to me. You are one of the smartest employees here, your GPA is a solid 4.5, and I see you rising up the corporate ladder quickly. But you really need to gain some weight."

"I know, Mrs.Glut, I've always wanted to big like you, but my parents never fed me enough to get big like all the models. When I was little, all the school girls were
big, and I was so small. All the girls waddled by the time they were in elementary school, and I was always like a twig."
A single tear dripped down her thin cheek.

"Now now dear! It's ok, I understand. That's why I've called this little meeting. I'd like to inform you that we're going to get you nice and big. I've signed you up for a fattening session after work today."

"What's that?"

''A bunch of highly trained professionals will put you into a machine and get you to the weight you want."

"Wow! Thank you very much Mrs.Glut!"

"Just remember what I said. I like to treat my employees like family, and a daughter never disobeys her mother. I expect good work out of you."

"Yes ma'am! You're under my command!"

"Good, now go to your fattening session."

Alex motioned to get up, but she noticed the levi-chair was already taking her out of the building. It moved over to her hover-cycle and and she got on. It auto-piloted itself to the city fattening center.
A voicechat came up on her e-glasses.
"Ah, Alexis. I hope you don't mind I've taken control of your ride for the evening. Just a friendly boss to employee gesture."

The message ended and Alex rode to the center. Alex was concerned that Bertha was being 'too' nice to her.

"Hello, Bertha sent you! Right this way, Alex."

The large nurse waddled Bertha to a wall with several buttons.

"Pick your future size! Please feel free to take your time."

Alex looked over her choices...

11122.title: Alex starts out fatter

choices: And the CEO was there to greet her (in person)
1113.content:
In the year 3000, nearly everyone is obese. Fashion shoots flaunt models with titanic bellies. Meals are massive. Hovering chairs and cars mean that very few people move. In this world, fat is considered sexy. Only a small subset of the population is thin, and Alex is among them. She does not like it.

Alex woke up and grabbed her clothes she set out the night before. As always, she hated the small size. Whereas most of her friends in high school wore 10XXXL’s, her clothes were so small they could fit inside her friend’s legs. Her pants were so small in the waist that a flea could fit in them. They were so small that they had to be tailored to her frame. As did her shirts. And bras. And pretty much everything else. No normal sizes fit her. And it was all because of her parents, restricting the amount of food she could eat. It was because of her parents she was the size she was. If only I was allowed to eat more food, then I would be the size of my friends, and less abused, Alex thought. Because of her weight, she was the target of constant bullying at school. Everyone called her stick. My problems are to be solved. Alex comforted herself.

Getting into a temporary hoverchair, Alex went to the solution to her problems. The Bureau of Employment. There she was to receive an official ID, an upgraded hoverchair, and a job. In short, she would become an adult. At last I can break free of my parent’s grip, she thought. Turning into the building, she floated to the receptionist’s desk and spoke. “My name is Alex Mathers. I have appointments for hoverchair sizing, ID, and at the job office,” she said. The receptionist looked at her “Oh yes. Second, third, and ninth floors respectively” she said, turning her hoverchair in the direction of the elevator. “thanks,” Alex muttered, floating in that direction. She got into the elevator and pushed the button for the second floor. As she traveled, she could only think about how small she was.
The hoverchair designer shouted “You so thin!” when he saw Alex. Alex responded “I know,” in a shameful tone. “Please. I beg you. Give me my hoverchair so I can grow,” she continued. The designer then pulled out a tablet full of specs, selected some, and a moment later a hoverchair popped out from a rapid 3-D printer. Alex marveled at its size, as it was designed to fit up to a half ton human. The automated feeding hands were just as she imagined them. The seat seemed extremely comfortable, and as she sat in it a moment later, her suspicions were confirmed. “Let me know if you outgrow it,” the designer said. “I plan too,” Alex responded as she floated away rubbing her stomach, contemplating her new lack of limitations and what they would do to her figure.

Alex then went to the ID center on the third floor to receive her official, adult, ID. After the initial shock of the clerk at her size, the ID assignment was normal. She was asked to hover in front of a screen and the clerk had the camera adjust so as to focus on the head and shoulders. It then took a picture and the ID was printed and handed to her. Once again, Alex floated away, only this time to get a job.

At the job assignment office, she had the by now expected exchange with the secretary and laid back in her hoverchair. She was sweating profusely, as this was the defining moment of her life. If there was an employer willing to take a girl as thin as her, then she would be given a company house and could gain weight. If there was not, then she would return to her parents and not gain a pound. I have been waiting for many hours now. Maybe I should leave. Alex thought. Just as she turned to leave, having given up all hope, she heard a shout. “Alex Mathers. The job director will see you now.” Alex sighed internally. I may not be hopeless after all, she thought, turning towards the job office again and going into the job director’s office. Despite her newfound confidence, she could not help but perceive the sound of the door shutting behind her as ominous.

The job director’s office was voluminous. 20 meters back, a giant hoverdesk was lit by natural light from behind. Curtained windows along the length immersed the rest of the room in darkness. The job director was looking at the outside through the window. “Alex. Come in,” he said. As Alex floated slowly towards the director, he had already begun speaking. “As both you and I know, your performance thus far has been admirable. You have achieved perfect scores on all your standardized tests. You have a 4.5 GPA in tough classes. In fact, you are an impeccable student and employee. There is just one problem…” “my weight.” Alex interrupted. “Why yes,” the director responded, “Why are you so thin,” he continued. The tears began coursing down Alex’s cheeks. “It is my parents. They restricted my food intake. They restricted it so much that while every other girl waddled by the end of preschool, I could not, no matter how hard I tried.” She sobbed. “You poor child,” the director said. “Let me guess already. I did not get a job,” Alex sobbed. “You did, though.” The director said. Alex interrupted yet again. “I bet it is a horrible job, though,” she sobbed. “You have gotten the best job for your skills. You are now a machine programmer at Gainers Central HQ,” the director stated. Alex sank back into her hoverchair in awe. Immediately, her thoughts became chaotic. Gainers Central. The reverse anorexia company. And I will be working on their feeding machines. Yes! Alex thought. “When should I report for work?” Alex inquired. The director shouted, “They’re so excited to have you they want you right now!” “Tell the man I’ll see him soon!” Alex shouted. She then turned and rocketed down the halls in her hoverchair, exhilarated at her newfound speed. She burst out the door of the jobs office and rocketed down the street. She turned left. Then right. Then right again. Then left, her hands moving the controls of the hoverchair so fast it seemed as though they were guided by muscle memory alone. It should be around this corner. Alex thought. It was not there. Okay. Maybe the next. not there either. Now Alex was getting concerned. I’ll give it one more corner before I begin to freak out, she thought. She turned the last corner, and there was Gainers Central.
1113.title: 3,000 A.D

112.content:
Lizzie was small, even for girls. She had blue eyes and brunette, super curly hair. Even when she had hit puberty, there were minimal changes. She remained small, so small. Even now, finally cresting five feet at 19 years old, she was dangerously underweight at 75 pounds. Her doctors told her she needed to put on weight, her mother wanted her to put on weight, even she wanted to put on weight, but nothing seemed to work. She always stayed her same gaunt self.

Until one day, something new appeared. A new restaurant opened in town. Lizzie had made a habit of eating fast food in a attempt to put on weight, but until now it hadn't worked. This restaurant,called "Swell Ego", boasted a large menu, including foreign favorites like Euros, Gyros, Lo Mein, Sweet and Sour Chicken, Borscht, Schnitzel, Curry, all sorts of bread, all with a calorie laden twist on them. Lizzie's eating habits allowed her to eat an impressive amount, so when she tabulated how many calories she was able to eat in a single sitting there, even she was amazed with herself.

"6,000 calories in one meal?" her mom said as she looked at her notes.

"Yup. Six Thousand. I counted it three times to be sure." Lizzie replied, as her mom handed the notes back to her. Lizzie's hands then moved down and rubbed her round stomach, still full from dinner at Swell Ego. The food sat heavy in her, making her feel fatter already.

"Maybe this'll actually help you put on some weight!" her mom said, placing a hand on her shoulder.

"I hope so..." Liz said as she got up, holding her stomach almost like a pregnant lady. "I'm going to go to bed, that meal has me pooped."

"Good, get some rest, that should help some weight pile on." her mom replied as Liz waddled her way to her room. She entered and stripped down and then put her pj's on. Her stomach peeking out under the shirt. She crawled into her bed, hands on her stomach and drifted to sleep.

*Lizzie slept roughly through the night, her body churning the food through her system.

Lizzie awoke, groggy. She dragged herself out of bed and walked to her bathroom. She entered and used the toilet, a refreshing feeling washing over her as she finished. She stripped off her pj's, noticing her stomach wasn't swollen anymore and turned on her shower. She waited for the water to heat up and noticed her scale.

"Noting to lose. Let's see what Swell Ego did to me..." she stepped onto the scale and saw that she now weighed...
112.title: Lizzie the Pettite

choices: Lizzie takes her advice, but goes easy on it

11533221112.content:
As time passed, as time usually does, the initial meal that began this process was eventually forgotten; though it was far from an isolated event.

While not uncommon for her to do so, Bailey always felt some sort of hesitation inviting her friends over before that afternoon of enlightenment. It wasn't that she didn't like her friends coming over, far from it actually, or that she was embarrassed about her family's modest nest egg that they seemed to be surviving quite nicely off of. Her mother was polite and kept her nose out of her daughter's business as a good mother should, and Michelle was usually either out with friends or holed up in her room playing some kind of video game. It was Cassie, her clean-nosed little goodie-goodie of a sister who hadn't done much of anything wrong in her entire life flaunting her college education. Okay, that might have been an exaggeration, but still the point remained that Bailey didn't feel comfortable around Cassie since she had started college.

Though at the insistence of her friends, Bailey was inclined to bring them around quite often: whether she liked it or not.

This increase in company led Cassie to prepare a larger quantity of food to match with the larger quantity of guests. It was no strain on her or the family; Cassie loved to cook for larger crowds and her mother Wanda had no objections to splurging a little for more ingredients. Almost every other night, if not every night of the working week, Bailey was goaded into inviting at least one or two of her friends over for dinner and Cassie was happy to oblige with a few extra servings here and there. It wasn't awkward in the least for anyone at the table, at least not after a while. Soon enough most of Bailey's friends had become like members of the family themselves; laughing, telling jokes at the dinner table, staying over for the weekends if they weren't too busy! Wanda even joked that she should "just sign the adoption papers and get it over with!"

As more time passed, the demand for Cassie's delicious food spiked as she grew more and more handy around the kitchen. Many, many plates of seconds were served as the table of gourmands' appetites grew more accustomed to Cassie's fine cuisine and, as predicted, bellies and figures did soften quite a bit. It started out simply enough with a few earnest bouts of energy in Cassie that urged her to push her culinary envelope, but when the complaints coming from the table resounded "is this really all that she's cooking?", Cassie was happy to oblige the eager eaters with another course. Few saw the pattern, namely Hera, and swore off of visiting for good (or at least until Bailey got her own place) though the others remained fixed to their spots at the ever-growing kitchen table; doomed to grow rounder and rounder amongst themselves...

***


Cassie stood at her usual place on every Saturday morning; in front of the stove whipping up something tasty and delicious for breakfast. Today's menu was bland in culture though extraordinary though Cassie's specialty; pancakes. Unlike most other pancakes though these were stacked high on top of each other, made with only the finest of purchasable mix, and (upon Michelle's request and unto no objections) were: topped with blueberry syrup, suffocated in whipped cream, covered chocolate flakes, and crowned with a single cherry. It was a pain to make every other weekend or so, but it seemed to make everybody happy enough. Using her worn spatula to flip another griddle cake, Cassie winced as a bit of melted butter splashed onto her unprotected arm.

"Ouch!" she hollered, instinctively recoiling to clutch the afflicted area.

"Honey?" her mother cried cautiously from the living room, "Are you alright in there?"

Cassie cursed to herself quietly before answering, "Yeah, I'm alright Mom!" To convince herself and ease her suffering, she blew gently on the quickly flushing spot on her wrist. "Are you sure, I could come in there and help, you know?" Ever the fighter, Cassie shrugged it off. "No, I'm alright Mom!" she shouted back, "You just keep doing what you're doing, breakfast'll be ready in a bit!" Cassie hated all the shouting in the house, probably the most out of everyone. It made it hard for her to study, especially when somebody wanted something from her and she was holed up in her room...

But looking at her mother now, it seemed to be the only option short of a strict plan of diet and exercise.

"Okay!" she shouted, concluding the shouting match between her and her daughter. Without a second thought, the older woman's portly fingers began dancing once more across her keyboard. It really wasn't like she could have gotten up to help Cassie if there was an emergency, certainly not in a timely manner anyway. A desk job combined with her rather sedentary lifestyle- not to mention her increasingly lackluster eating habits- had landed her a far ways away from her once svelte, rather firm figure that she had prided herself on. In its place lay several components to a failed replacement: a heavy set of breasts that sagged slightly with her age, a rotund stomach that censored her privates when naked and bulged outwards to keep her doughy arms at an angle, and most notably an absolutely enormous rump that had all but wedged her in the snug office chair she had forced herself into. Her short hair, an aged platinum blond, was somewhat unkempt for her weekend regimen of relaxation. Said regime was also reflected in her choice of remaining in her pj's. As she typed, Wanda found that she was striking an extra key once or twice; she dismissed it as a rusty attempt at keyboarding. However it was obvious to everyone else: her fingers were too fat to type regularly. And it was starting to get to her...

"Michelle, I wish you wouldn't play such loud games!" she barked, her impatience in herself and in her appetite finally surfacing in misplaced anger. "And they're so violent, what daughter plays stuff like this in front of her mother?!"

As had been her mother's, Michelle's growth was nothing short of exponential. Gone was the thin, waif-like frame she sported before. Gone were the days of fitting into skinny jeans and tight shirts from Hot Topic. Having already gotten used to Cassie's cooking, Michelle had already developed a habit of overindulgence far before everyone else. Acting as an unofficial "taste tester" had finally paid its toll on Michelle's skinny shape as it rapidly ballooned outwards. In no time she was sporting heavy lovehandles, chubby cheeks, and a rounded belly; but that was months before. In place of the almost abnormally skinny girl what once had been, a truly fat drink of water sat plopped in her place. Michelle's belly, left free to hang due to her far-too-small shirt (a habit developed out of necessity) was a pale, squishy dome that rose even while she reclined. It divided itself into two distinct rolls that hung heavily over her crotch separating her legs forever. "Ugh, thanks a lot Mom!" she bickered with her mother, "I just got killed by an Overlord, you happy?!" Michelle was so lazy in fact, that she barely turned her head as she feuded with her mother- instead keeping her relaxed position steady: armed with her controller and both wrists resting on her heavy belly.

"What is with all the noise?!" Bailey shouted as she, too came into the clamor. Unlike the rest of her family, Bailey's unfamiliarity with Cassie kept her on edge and constantly bickering with her sister, thus not eating nearly as much as her overfed and slothly family. While true, she had gained just a little weight, Baily was nowhere near the size of her mother, and far from the size of her fat little sister. However she was still far from her old self. Bailey's old body had slowly inflated outwards with blubber, spreading rather proportionately and evenly as she grew fatter. Now she was officially overweight, though she hated to admit it. She wore her weight well, most of it going to her chest and keeping her busty. Bailey hadn't refused to continue her regular routine though, as such her skin was quite tanned and her hair still very much blond. "I wake up to Jessie trying to smother me in arm fat-" yes you pervs, they shared a bed when her friends came over. It's not exactly a big house and there aren't just spare mattresses lying around. Get your mind out of the gutter- "And all I hear is you three yelling!"

"Jessie's still asleep?" Wanda said sympathetically

"Yeah, well that's what she gets for staying up with Cassie all night."

"Wait a sec, I just gave her the pan of cookies and went to bed!" Cassie refuted in innocence from the kitchen, "Don't wrap me into this!"

"Well go wake her up and ask her if she wants breakfast." Wanda said sternly, "It'll be ready in a minute, right Cassie?"

"Yeah, call Bella and see if she's gonna be here?"

"You know she is, girl's never said no to your cooking." Bailey said abashedly...

Remaining this ignorant of nutritional values, Jade has put on weight after graduating high school and moving out into her own apartment. Twenty-five pounds to be exact. However, that weight gain hasn’t bothered her or stopped her lifestyle of lazing about in her own room listening to music.

Speaking of her own room, it’s a dark, depressing mess.

Now that Jade is completely out of food to eat, a shopping trip is in order.

"And that means I have to go outside...just kill me..."

Grumbling included, the trip to the supermarket is quite the complex trip since Jade rarely leaves the apartment.

It’s just across the street.

Jade didn’t have to walk long to find what she exactly wanted snacks lining up and down the shelves the entire aisle…and the more.

And then there it was. Right on display in the clearance bin Jade noticed that other snacks were on sale. The clearance bin is just filled to the brim with packaged snacks that were on sale for pennies a pop. In a rare moment of emotion, Jade fought to hide her excited smile. "This could last me the entire summer! No! The rest of the year! I'll never have to leave the room again!"

Ten dollars was all it took to get away like a bandit from the grocery store. Jade experienced major trouble keeping her dark and brooding face while wheeling away a massive haul of junk food.


After multiple, physical exerting trips from the car and back, Jade has finally completely stocked her room with snacks intended to last for a very long time. Satisfied, she opens a box of frosted honeybuns and begins to marathon her favorite Adult Swim shows.

Later that summer...

"Thanks again for the job" Diane said walking with Cindy to her cubical. Diane was sporting a business dress with a short skirt exposing her smooth toned legs, and a shirt exhibiting her busty cleavage. "Don't mention it" said Cindy leading Diane to her cubical.
